name: MangaLoader
description: Telegram Bot to Upload Manga/Comic URLs to Telegram as PDF/ZIP or Folder.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string.

OWNER_ID.description: Your telegram id, not username. Open https://t.me/MissRose_bot and send /id to bot

AS_ZIP.description: Send files as zip or send files one by one, left empty to send files one by one. except for Folder option.
